title: Industrial San Serif - Paper Plane Bar/Restaurant
content:
Looking for the typeface on the backlit sign.

Seems fairly simple. A bit like Engravers Gothic, but with more of any Industrial bent. Any ideas? Many thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725140925im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_2160_6361.jpg)
author: martinzero

comments.content:
It looks like a **[Sackers Gothic Square](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725140925/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Monotype&ffam=Sackers%20Gothic%20Std%20-%20Square&fid=41467703b370ccb01b2c648e2e21c03c&fstyle=b&fsize=60&text=PAPER%20PLANE&fit=1)**, probably a bit emboldened

\*edit\*: I now see that /R leg is a bit off

Or House Industries: United Sans Bold SmExtd with /E nipped.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725140925im_/http:/typophile.com/files/paper1_6012.jpg)
